title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon - Wikipedia
snippet: LFI was confirmed as the largest party of the French left in the 2024 French legislative election, where the left-wing New Popular Front (NFP) achieved a plurality of seats and LFI was confirmed as the largest left-wing group in the National Assembly. Mélenchon was born in Tangier (Tangier International Zone), Morocco. His father, Georges, was a postmaster of Spanish descent, and his mother, Jeanine Bayona, was a primary school teacher of Spanish and Sicilian descent.

title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon facts for kids
snippet: He then helped create a group of left-wing parties called the New Ecological and Social People's Union (NUPES) and later the New Popular Front (NFP). ... Jean-Luc Mélenchon was born in Tangier, Morocco.

title: Who Is Jean-Luc Melenchon? All About The New Popular Front Leader | Europe - Times Now
snippet: Jean-Luc Melenchon, born on August 19, 1951, in Tangier, Morocco, is the son of a postmaster and a primary school teacher.After working as a teacher for a while, Melenchon entered politics in September 1976 and joined the Socialist Party (PS).

title: French elections: Who is Mélenchon and what does his Nupes alliance want?
snippet: A veteran firebrand of France's far left, Jean-Luc Mélenchon has a strong chance of depriving President Emmanuel Macron of controlling the next government. He leads an alliance of far-left, left and green parties that took the president's centrist ...
